metadata.note: Light ICP based on who Barrett has actually worked with. Not customer-research validated.

definition.who: Marketing managers and creative directors at mid-market lifestyle/CPG brands

company_profile.size: Series B+ startups to established mid-market ($10M-$500M revenue)
company_profile.growth_stage: Scaling brands investing in content to fuel growth

beliefs: The right creative partner makes their job easier
fears: Working with difficult or unreliable creatives

awareness_level.description: They know they need a photographer/production partner. They're comparing options.
awareness_level.implication: Don't educate on 'why content matters' - show why Playground is the right choice

pain_points.pain: Big agencies are slow, expensive, and bureaucratic
pain_points.evidence: Barrett's own positioning against 'agencies with hurdles'
pain_points.quote_hypothesis: I don't have time to go through 5 people just to get feedback on a shot

pain_points.pain: Freelancers can be unreliable or hard to scale
pain_points.quote_hypothesis: I need someone who can handle a bigger shoot, not just headshots

pain_points.pain: Content needs are constant but budgets aren't unlimited
pain_points.quote_hypothesis: We have 4 campaigns this quarter and the same budget as last year

functional: Flexibility to scale up or down based on project
emotional: Feel confident presenting work to leadership
Enjoy the creative process (not dread it)
Trust their creative partner to 'get it'
identity: Be seen as someone who works with great creative talent
Build a brand they're proud of
Be the person who found the 'secret weapon' agency

objections.objection: Are they big enough to handle our project?
objections.counter: Portfolio proof points (Samsung, Michelob Ultra, Celsius). Modular team scales to project needs.

objections.objection: Can they deliver on our timeline?
objections.counter: 'Tight deadlines' is explicitly called out as a strength. Nimble = faster.
$8K-$15K sweet spot positions as premium-but-accessible. Not cheap, not enterprise.

buying_triggers: Growing too fast for current creative resources
Leadership asking 'why does our content look dated?'

transformation_narrative.before: Juggling unreliable freelancers or fighting agency bureaucracy. Stressed about deadlines. Content is a pain point.
transformation_narrative.after: Have a trusted creative partner who 'gets it'. Campaigns launch smoothly. Content becomes a competitive advantage.

messaging_hooks: We make content creation feel easy.
Your brand deserves better than stock photos.

definition.who: Producers and creative directors at marketing/creative agencies who hire production partners for client work

company_profile.type: Creative agencies, marketing agencies, brand consultancies

definition.confidence: MEDIUM - some portfolio clients likely came through agencies

values: Reliable partners who don't make them look bad
fears: Production partner drops the ball on client shoot
Going over budget and eating the margin

awareness_level.description: They already know production partners exist. Looking for the right fit for specific projects.
awareness_level.implication: Portfolio and testimonials matter most. Make it easy to vet quickly.

pain_points.pain: Need to find reliable production partners for specialized work
Production partners who are hard to work with or miss deadlines

objections.objection: Can they work within our client's budget?
Will they make us look good to our client?
objections.counter: Portfolio speaks for itself. White-label friendly.

transformation_narrative.before: Scrambling to find production help for client projects. Worried about quality and reliability.
transformation_narrative.after: Have a go-to production partner they can trust. Client projects run smoothly.

segment_priority.rationale: Direct brand relationships are higher margin and build portfolio. Agency work is good volume but less control.
segment_priority.website_focus: Lead with brand-direct messaging. Agency-friendly but not agency-focused.

validation_needed.method: Ask Barrett who actually signs the checks

validation_needed.hypothesis: Timeline/speed is a top decision factor
